description: This file defines various Flutter widget classes for screens in a TV interface application, including detail, search, watchlist, and settings screens. It contains UI layout code, focus management for D-pad navigation, and interactions such as snack bars and navigation.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: A screen showing detailed information about an item, with focusable buttons for actions like Play and Add to Watchlist.

classes.name: _DetailsButtons
classes.description: A widget managing focus and actions for Play and Add buttons on the details screen.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A focusable search interface with recent searches and search results list.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State management for SearchScreen, handling search logic and UI updates.

classes.name: WatchlistScreen
classes.description: Displays a list of watchlist items with focusable remove buttons.

classes.name: _WatchlistRow
classes.description: A row representing a watchlist item with navigation and remove button.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: A focusable list of user settings options.

classes.name: _SettingsTile
classes.description: A focusable and animated list tile for a settings option, with activation callback.

classes.name: _SearchFieldStub
classes.description: A placeholder focusable search field with focus and interaction handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI for each class, arranging layout, focus handling, and interactions.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes FocusNodes and other controllers when widgets are removed.

methods.name: _runSearch
methods.description: Executes a search using AppState and updates results state.

methods.name: onActivate
methods.description: Callbacks triggering focus or action activation for focusable widgets.
